articles.title: Travellers stuck in Asian airports due to flight disruptions after Manila air traffic control glitch - The Straits Times
articles.description:
At least 56,000 passengers were affected, according to the Manila International Airport Authority.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Mr John Paul Ambon has visited Singapore 13 times, but was met with a flight delay for the first time on Sunday when he wanted to return home to the Philippines.
